steps.name: gcr.io/cloud-builders/curl
args:
_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON=$(curl -s -L "$API/krane/get-app-data?name=$NAME") && \
           echo "$_CLIENT_REPOS_JSON" | jq -c '.repos.client[]' | while read -r client; do \
             PROJECT_NAME=$(echo "$client" | jq -r '.name'); \
             echo "Cloning $PROJECT_NAME into client/$PROJECT_NAME"; \
             git clone https://github.com/genesiskrane/gk-vite "client/$PROJECT_NAME"; \
             cd "client/$PROJECT_NAME"; \
             npm install; \
             npx vite build; \
             find . -mindepth 1 ! -name 'dist' ! -path './dist/*' -exec rm -rf {} +; \
             cd -; \
           done
